section.title: The Portlet Fields description.
section.para: All fields used to define a portlet are listed below.
Some field have default value (scriptName, menuName, screenName or formName), other must be filled (portletId, type, component and sub-component,...).
Default values should be used, when it's possible

tip.para: Find above the list of fields and a long description of the field role when you go hover it, long description and its default value.
